issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Add roundtrip tests for single column batches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10191](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10191). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To aid with test coverage and picking up information loss during Parquet and Arrow roundtrips, we can add tests that assert that all supported Arrow datatypes can be written and read correctly.
